Source code for src.services.base

from pydantic_settings import BaseSettings




[docs]
class Settings(BaseSettings):
    DATABASE_URL: str
    JWT_SECRET: str
    JWT_ALGORITHM: str
    JWT_EXPIRE_MINUTES: int
    CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME: str
    CLOUDINARY_API_KEY: str
    CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET: str
    SMTP_SERVER: str
    SMTP_PORT: int
    SMTP_USER: str
    SMTP_PASSWORD: str
    MAIL_FROM_EMAIL: str
    BASE_URL: str
    POSTGRES_USER: str
    POSTGRES_PASSWORD: str
    POSTGRES_DB: str
    PGADMIN_DEFAULT_EMAIL: str
    PGADMIN_DEFAULT_PASSWORD: str



[docs]
    class Config:
        env_file = ".env"
        env_file_encoding = "utf-8"
        extra = "ignore"






settings = Settings()
